scripts.chat:backend:seed: cd go-inventory-chat && GOWORK=off go run ./cmd/inventory-chat seed --db ./data/inventory.db --force
scripts.chat:backend:serve: cd go-inventory-chat && GOWORK=off go run ./cmd/inventory-chat serve --db ./data/inventory.db --addr :8081 --allow-origin http://localhost:5173
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/engine && npm run build -w apps/inventory && npm run build -w apps/todo && npm run build -w apps/crm && npm run build -w apps/book-tracker-debug
